final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Main_Process
        A[Application received] --> B[Send marketing information]
        B --> C[Marketing information]
        C --> D{Response received}
        D -->|via email| E[Create electronic response]
        D -->|by post| E
        E --> F[Assess response]
        F -->|clarification needed| G[Make appointment]
        G --> H[Send appointment information]
        H --> I[Discuss application]
        I -->|application ok| J{XORGateway}
        I -->|application not ok| K[Recommendation]
        J -->|application ok| L{ParallelGateway}
        J -->|application not ok| K
        L --> M[Make offer]
        M --> N[Send offer]
        N -->|Application rejected| O[Cancel offer]
        N -->|Offer revocation| P[Create offer revocation]
        P --> Q[Send offer revocation]
        Q --> R[Revocation handled]
        O --> S[Handle revocation]
        S --> T[Revocation to be handled]
        T --> U[Application handled]
        N -->|Application accepted| V[Application handled]
        subgraph Handle_acceptance
            M -->|Offer required| W[File application]
            W -->|Application rejected| X[Delete application]
            X --> Y[Application rejected]
        end
        F -->|Application cancellation received| Z[Application rejected]
        F -->|Application rejected| K
    end
    subgraph Parallel_Process
        A -->|1 week| AA{ParallelGateway}
        AA --> AB[Application aborted]
        AB --> AC[Application rejected]
        AA --> AD[Application rejected]
    end
    subgraph Rejection_Process
        F -->|Application not ok| AE[Recommendation]
        AE --> AF[Prepare rejection]
        AF --> AG[Send rejection]
        AG --> AH[Application rejected]
    end
